HTMLFormControlsCollection.summary: The HTMLFormControlsCollection interface represents a collection of HTML form control elements, returned by the interface's property.

remarks.para: This interface replaces one method from , on which it is based.

HTMLFormControlsCollectionNamedItem.summary:
The HTMLFormControlsCollection.namedItem() method returns
the or the in the collection whose
name or id match the specified name, or null if
no node matches.

remarks.para:
Note that this version of namedItem() hides the one inherited from
. Like that one, in JavaScript, using the array bracket
syntax with a , like collection["value"] is
equivalent to collection.namedItem("value").
